Date: 2024-12-12 17:49
Subject: STORE CLOSURE - Penhaligons Dubai Mall on Thu 31st Oct 2024
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a store closure of  “Penhaligons Dubai Mall on Tuesday 31st Dec 2024.

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	@Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  @Sheljan KOCHAPPAN1 <mailto:Sheljan.KOCHAPPAN1@chalhoub.com>  Please share the documentation at the earliest to store email to apply for permits.
*	Create a Return to warehouse by @Naeem Baniameen <mailto:Naeem.Baniameen@puigme.com>  @Babu Kodithodika <mailto:Kodithodika.Babu@puigme.com>  and create an appointment/ ASN request trough one reach for all merchandising.
*	Apply for Work Mall/police permit (return stocks, transfer / stock packing/ IT Equipment) @Penhaligon Dubai Mall <mailto:Penhaligon.DM@chalhoub.com> @Mohamed Gawish <mailto:mohamed.gawish@puigme.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 31st Dec. @Penhaligon Dubai Mall <mailto:Penhaligon.DM@chalhoub.com> @Mohamed Gawish <mailto:mohamed.gawish@puigme.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be transferred to new Location and share the TID/MID with Ghouse .

Subject: STORE CLOSURE - Penhaligons Dubai Mall on Thu 31st Oct 2024 
 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a store closure of  “Penhaligons Dubai Mall on Tuesday 31st Dec 2024.

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	@Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  @Sheljan KOCHAPPAN1 <mailto:Sheljan.KOCHAPPAN1@chalhoub.com>  Please share the documentation at the earliest to store email to apply for permits.
*	Create a Return to warehouse by @Naeem Baniameen <mailto:Naeem.Baniameen@puigme.com>  @Babu Kodithodika <mailto:Kodithodika.Babu@puigme.com>  and create an appointment/ ASN request trough one reach for all merchandising.
*	Apply for Work Mall/police permit (return stocks, transfer / stock packing/ IT Equipment) @Penhaligon Dubai Mall <mailto:Penhaligon.DM@chalhoub.com> @Mohamed Gawish <mailto:mohamed.gawish@puigme.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 31st Dec. @Penhaligon Dubai Mall <mailto:Penhaligon.DM@chalhoub.com> @Mohamed Gawish <mailto:mohamed.gawish@puigme.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be transferred to new Location and share the TID/MID with Ghouse . @Penhaligon Dubai Mall <mailto:Penhaligon.DM@chalhoub.com> @Mohamed Gawish <mailto:mohamed.gawish@puigme.com> 
*	@Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  please ensure all CCTV camera and NVR is dismantled on 1st Jan before trading hours.

@chalhoub.com>; Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com>; Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>
Subject: STORE CLOSURE - Penhaligons Dubai Mall on Thu 31st Oct 2024
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a store closure of  “Penhaligons Dubai Mall on Tuesday 31st Dec 2024.

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	@Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  @Sheljan KOCHAPPAN1 <mailto:Sheljan.KOCHAPPAN1@chalhoub.com>  Please share the documentation at the earliest to store email to apply for permits.

*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 31st Dec. @Penhaligon Dubai Mall <mailto:Penhaligon.DM@chalhoub.com> @Mohamed Gawish <mailto:mohamed.gawish@puigme.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be transferred to new Location and share the TID/MID with Ghouse . @Penhaligon Dubai Mall <mailto:Penhaligon.DM@chalhoub.com> @Mohamed Gawish <mailto:mohamed.gawish@puigme.com>
